feed.title: Paperless-ngx Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.11.4
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.11.4

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: initial upload message not being dismissed @shamoon (#7438)

All App Changes

  • Fix: initial upload message not being dismissed @shamoon (#7438)

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.11.6
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.11.6

[!NOTE]
Paperless-ngx v2.11.6 fixes an issue with one of our dependencies that prevented uploading files in version 2.11.5. "Bare-metal" users may need to re-download the NLTK data to the PAPERLESS_NLTK_DIR (see the docs).

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: fix nltk tokenizer breaking change @shamoon (#7522)
  • Fix: use JSON for update archive file auditlog entries @shamoon (#7503)
  • Fix: respect deskew / rotate pages from AppConfig if set @shamoon (#7501)

Dependencies

5 changes - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group across 1 directory with 6 updates @dependabot ([#7502](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7502)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7497](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7497)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump axios from 1.6.7 to 1.7.4 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7472](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7472)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump ruff from 0.5.6 to 0.5.7 in the development group @dependabot ([#7457](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7457)) - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group with 3 updates @dependabot ([#7460](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7460))

All App Changes

8 changes - Fix: fix nltk tokenizer breaking change @shamoon ([#7522](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7522)) - Fix: use JSON for update archive file auditlog entries @shamoon ([#7503](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7503)) - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group across 1 directory with 6 updates @dependabot ([#7502](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7502)) - Fix: respect deskew / rotate pages from AppConfig if set @shamoon ([#7501](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7501)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7497](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7497)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump axios from 1.6.7 to 1.7.4 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7472](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7472)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump ruff from 0.5.6 to 0.5.7 in the development group @dependabot ([#7457](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7457)) - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group with 3 updates @dependabot ([#7460](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7460))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.12.0
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.12.0

Features / Enhancements

  • Enhancement: re-work mail rule dialog, support multiple include patterns @shamoon (#7635)
  • Enhancement: add Korean language @shamoon (#7573)
  • Enhancement: allow multiple filename attachment exclusion patterns for a mail rule @MelleD (#5524)
  • Refactor: Use django-filter logic for filtering full text search queries @yichi-yang (#7507)
  • Refactor: Reduce number of SQL queries when serializing List[Document] @yichi-yang (#7505)

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: use JSON for note audit log entries @shamoon (#7650)
  • Fix: Rework system check so it won't crash if tesseract is not found @stumpylog (#7640)
  • Fix: correct broken pdfjs worker src after upgrade to pdfjs v4 @shamoon (#7626)
  • Chore: remove unused frontend dependencies @shamoon (#7607)
  • Fix: fix non-clickable scroll wheel in file uploads list @shamoon (#7591)
  • Fix: deselect file tasks select all button on dismiss @shamoon (#7592)
  • Fix: saved view sidebar heading not always visible @shamoon (#7584)
  • Fix: correct select field wrapping with long text @shamoon (#7572)
  • Fix: update ng-bootstrap to fix datepicker bug @shamoon (#7567)

Dependencies

11 changes - Chore(deps): Bump cryptography from 42.0.8 to 43.0.1 @dependabot ([#7620](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7620)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 3 updates @dependabot ([#7608](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7608)) - Chore(deps): Bump rapidfuzz from 3.9.6 to 3.9.7 in the small-changes group @dependabot ([#7611](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7611)) - Chore(deps): Bump tslib from 2.6.3 to 2.7.0 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7606](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7606)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @playwright/test from 1.45.3 to 1.46.1 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7603](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7603)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump typescript from 5.4.5 to 5.5.4 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7604](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7604)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-eslint-dependencies group in /src-ui with 4 updates @dependabot ([#7600](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7600)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 21 updates @dependabot ([#7599](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7599)) - Chore(deps): Bump pathvalidate from 3.2.0 to 3.2.1 in the small-changes group @dependabot ([#7548](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7548)) - Chore(deps): Bump micromatch from 4.0.5 to 4.0.8 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7551](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7551)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7545](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7545))

All App Changes

27 changes - Chore: Update backend dependencies in bulk @stumpylog ([#7656](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7656)) - Fix: Rework system check so it won't crash if tesseract is not found @stumpylog ([#7640](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7640)) - Refactor: performance and storage optimization of barcode scanning @loewexy ([#7646](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7646)) - Fix: use JSON for note audit log entries @shamoon ([#7650](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7650)) - Enhancement: re-work mail rule dialog, support multiple include patterns @shamoon ([#7635](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7635)) - Fix: correct broken pdfjs worker src after upgrade to pdfjs v4 @shamoon ([#7626](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7626)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 3 updates @dependabot ([#7608](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7608)) - Chore(deps): Bump rapidfuzz from 3.9.6 to 3.9.7 in the small-changes group @dependabot ([#7611](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7611)) - Chore: remove unused frontend dependencies @shamoon ([#7607](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7607)) - Chore(deps): Bump tslib from 2.6.3 to 2.7.0 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7606](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7606)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @playwright/test from 1.45.3 to 1.46.1 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7603](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7603)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump typescript from 5.4.5 to 5.5.4 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7604](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7604)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-eslint-dependencies group in /src-ui with 4 updates @dependabot ([#7600](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7600)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 21 updates @dependabot ([#7599](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7599)) - Fix: fix non-clickable scroll wheel in file uploads list @shamoon ([#7591](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7591)) - Fix: deselect file tasks select all button on dismiss @shamoon ([#7592](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7592)) - Fix: saved view sidebar heading not always visible @shamoon ([#7584](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7584)) - Enhancement: add Korean language @shamoon ([#7573](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7573)) - Enhancement: mail message preprocessor for gpg encrypted mails @dbankmann ([#7456](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7456)) - Fix: correct select field wrapping with long text @shamoon ([#7572](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7572)) - Fix: update ng-bootstrap to fix datepicker bug @shamoon ([#7567](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7567)) - Enhancement: allow multiple filename attachment exclusion patterns for a mail rule @MelleD ([#5524](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/5524)) - Chore(deps): Bump pathvalidate from 3.2.0 to 3.2.1 in the small-changes group @dependabot ([#7548](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7548)) - Chore(deps): Bump micromatch from 4.0.5 to 4.0.8 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7551](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7551)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7545](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7545)) - Refactor: Use django-filter logic for filtering full text search queries @yichi-yang ([#7507](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7507)) - Refactor: Reduce number of SQL queries when serializing List[Document] @yichi-yang ([#7505](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7505))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.12.1
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.12.1

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: wait to apply tag changes until other changes saved with multiple workflow actions @shamoon (#7711)
  • Fix: delete_pages should require ownership (not just change perms) @shamoon (#7714)
  • Fix: filter out shown custom fields that have been deleted from saved… @shamoon (#7710)
  • Fix: only filter by string or number properties for filter pipe @shamoon (#7699)
  • Fix: saved view permissions fixes @shamoon (#7672)
  • Fix: add permissions for OPTIONS requests for notes @shamoon (#7661)

All App Changes

7 changes - Fix: wait to apply tag changes until other changes saved with multiple workflow actions @shamoon ([#7711](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7711)) - Fix: delete\_pages should require ownership (not just change perms) @shamoon ([#7714](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7714)) - Enhancement: improve text contrast for selected documents in list view dark mode @shamoon ([#7712](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7712)) - Fix: filter out shown custom fields that have been deleted from saved… @shamoon ([#7710](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7710)) - Fix: only filter by string or number properties for filter pipe @shamoon ([#7699](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7699)) - Fix: saved view permissions fixes @shamoon ([#7672](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7672)) - Fix: add permissions for OPTIONS requests for notes @shamoon ([#7661](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7661))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.13.0
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.13.0

Notable Changes

  • Feature: OAuth2 Gmail and Outlook email support @shamoon (#7866)
  • Feature: Enhanced templating for filename format @stumpylog (#7836)
  • Feature: custom fields queries @shamoon (#7761)
  • Chore: Drop Python 3.9 support @stumpylog (#7774)

Features

  • Enhancement: QoL, auto-focus default select field in custom field dropdown @shamoon (#7961)
  • Change: open not edit @shamoon (#7942)
  • Enhancement: support retain barcode split pages @shamoon (#7912)
  • Enhancement: don't wait for doc API to load preview @shamoon (#7894)
  • Feature: OAuth2 Gmail and Outlook email support @shamoon (#7866)
  • Enhancement: live preview of storage path @shamoon (#7870)
  • Enhancement: management list button improvements @shamoon (#7848)
  • Enhancement: check for mail destination directory, log post-consume errors @mrichtarsky (#7808)
  • Enhancement: workflow overview toggle enable button @shamoon (#7818)
  • Enhancement: disable-able mail rules, add toggle to overview @shamoon (#7810)
  • Feature: auto-clean some invalid pdfs @shamoon (#7651)
  • Feature: page count @s0llvan (#7750)
  • Enhancement: use apt only when needed docker-entrypoint.sh @gawa971 (#7756)
  • Enhancement: set Django SESSION_EXPIRE_AT_BROWSER_CLOSE from PAPERLESS_ACCOUNT_SESSION_REMEMBER @shamoon (#7748)
  • Enhancement: allow setting session cookie age @shamoon (#7743)
  • Feature: copy workflows and mail rules, improve layout @shamoon (#7727)

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: remove space before my profile button in dropdown @tooomm (#7963)
  • Fix: v2.13.0 RC1 - Handling of Nones when using custom fields in filepath templating @stumpylog (#7933)
  • Fix: v2.13.0 RC1 - trigger move and rename after CustomFieldInstance saved @shamoon (#7927)
  • Fix: v2.13.0 RC1 - increase field max lengths to accommodate larger tokens @shamoon (#7916)
  • Fix: preserve text linebreaks in doc edit @shamoon (#7908)
  • Fix: only show colon on cards if correspondent and title shown @shamoon (#7893)
  • Fix: Allow ASN values of 0 from barcodes @stumpylog (#7878)
  • Fix: fix auto-dismiss completed tasks on open document @shamoon (#7869)
  • Fix: trigger change warning for saved views with default fields if changed @shamoon (#7865)
  • Fix: hidden canvas element causes scroll bug @shamoon (#7770)
  • Fix: handle overflowing dropdowns on mobile @shamoon (#7758)
  • Fix: chrome scrolling in >= 129 @shamoon (#7738)

Maintenance

  • Enhancement: use apt only when needed docker-entrypoint.sh @gawa971 (#7756)

Dependencies

10 changes - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @codecov/webpack-plugin from 1.0.1 to 1.2.0 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7830](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7830)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.5.2 to 22.7.4 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7829](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7829)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-eslint-dependencies group in /src-ui with 4 updates @dependabot ([#7827](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7827)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-jest-dependencies group in /src-ui with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7826](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7826)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @playwright/test from 1.46.1 to 1.47.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7828](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7828)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 21 updates @dependabot ([#7825](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7825)) - Chore: Upgrades OCRMyPDF to v16 @stumpylog ([#7815](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7815)) - Chore: Upgrades the Docker image to use Python 3.12 @stumpylog ([#7796](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7796)) - Chore: Upgrade Django to 5.1 @stumpylog ([#7795](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7795)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7723](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7723))

All App Changes

43 changes - Change: Use a TextField for the storage path field @stumpylog ([#7967](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7967)) - Fix: remove space before my profile button in dropdown @tooomm ([#7963](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7963)) - Enhancement: QoL, auto-focus default select field in custom field dropdown @shamoon ([#7961](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7961)) - Change: open not edit @shamoon ([#7942](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7942)) - Fix: v2.13.0 RC1 - Handling of Nones when using custom fields in filepath templating @stumpylog ([#7933](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7933)) - Fix: v2.13.0 RC1 - trigger move and rename after CustomFieldInstance saved @shamoon ([#7927](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7927)) - Fix: v2.13.0 RC1 - increase field max lengths to accommodate larger tokens @shamoon ([#7916](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7916)) - Enhancement: support retain barcode split pages @shamoon ([#7912](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7912)) - Fix: preserve text linebreaks in doc edit @shamoon ([#7908](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7908)) - Enhancement: don't wait for doc API to load preview @shamoon ([#7894](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7894)) - Fix: only show colon on cards if correspondent and title shown @shamoon ([#7893](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7893)) - Feature: OAuth2 Gmail and Outlook email support @shamoon ([#7866](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7866)) - Chore: Consolidate workflow logic @shamoon ([#7880](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7880)) - Enhancement: live preview of storage path @shamoon ([#7870](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7870)) - Fix: Allow ASN values of 0 from barcodes @stumpylog ([#7878](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7878)) - Fix: fix auto-dismiss completed tasks on open document @shamoon ([#7869](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7869)) - Fix: trigger change warning for saved views with default fields if changed @shamoon ([#7865](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7865)) - Feature: Enhanced templating for filename format @stumpylog ([#7836](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7836)) - Enhancement: management list button improvements @shamoon ([#7848](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7848)) - Enhancement: check for mail destination directory, log post-consume errors @mrichtarsky ([#7808](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7808)) - Feature: custom fields queries @shamoon ([#7761](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7761)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @codecov/webpack-plugin from 1.0.1 to 1.2.0 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7830](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7830)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.5.2 to 22.7.4 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7829](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7829)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-eslint-dependencies group in /src-ui with 4 updates @dependabot ([#7827](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7827)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-jest-dependencies group in /src-ui with 2 updates @dependabot ([#7826](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7826)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @playwright/test from 1.46.1 to 1.47.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#7828](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7828)) - Enhancement: workflow overview toggle enable button @shamoon ([#7818](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7818)) - Enhancement: disable-able mail rules, add toggle to overview @shamoon ([#7810](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7810)) - Chore: Upgrades the Docker image to use Python 3.12 @stumpylog ([#7796](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7796)) - Chore: Upgrade Django to 5.1 @stumpylog ([#7795](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/7795)) -
